greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A163531(n)-A163547(n).
comment: This sequence gives the difference of squares of distance from the origin to the n-th term, in the Peano curve (A163334) and the Hilbert curve (A163357) on an N x N grid. Because the Hilbert curve is based on powers of 4 and the Peano curve on powers of 9, the graph of this sequence contains dramatic swings.  [Edited to Peano vs Hilbert by _Kevin Ryde_, Aug 28 2020]
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65535
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 19 2009
